name: Jar Clicker
description: Jar Clicker is a clicker game where you click a jar but with a twist you have a slider that you have to slide to the right to start clicking. You can upgrade yoour clicks and click more and earn "p"(points). You have tasks to complete. And if you click it enough time you will see what will happend :D . Have fun with it and if you see bug please write comment or contact me on my email: burkana@abv.bg .
